name: JSON Tools
description: Format, validate, and manipulate JSON data. Includes JSON beautifier, minifier, and validator.

details.title: Paste, Sample, Copy, Clear
details.description: Quickly paste your own JSON, use sample data, copy results, or clear the editor with a single click.

details.title: Dual-pane JSON Viewer
details.description: View and edit raw JSON on the left, and see a formatted, interactive, collapsible tree view on the right.

details.title: Search & Filter
details.description: Instantly search and filter through your JSON data to find exactly what you need, even in large files.

details.title: Indentation & Formatting Options
details.description: Choose your preferred indentation (2 or 4 spaces), toggle quote keys, show array indices, collection count, sort keys, and trailing commas.

details.title: Font Size & Collapse Controls
details.description: Adjust font size for readability, and collapse or expand all nodes for easy navigation of complex structures.

details.title: Validation & Error Highlighting
details.description: Instantly validate your JSON and get clear error messages for invalid structures.

details.title: Offline & Private
details.description: All processing happens locally in your browser. Your data never leaves your device.

name: Base64 String
description: Encode and decode text to/from Base64. Useful for data encoding and transmission.

details.title: Encode & Decode Modes
details.description: Instantly switch between encoding and decoding text using the mode toggle. See results in real time as you type or paste.

details.title: Input & Output Areas
details.description: Enter your text in the input area and view the Base64 encoded or decoded output below. Clean separation for easy use.

details.title: One-Click Actions
details.description: Use Paste, Sample, Copy Input, Copy Output, and Clear buttons for fast workflow. No need to manually select or clear text.

details.title: Real-Time Results
details.description: Output updates instantly as you type, paste, or switch modes. No page reloads or extra clicks required.

details.title: Minimal, Intuitive UI
details.description: Clean, distraction-free interface with clear separation between input and output. Designed for speed and clarity.

details.title: Offline & Private
details.description: All processing happens locally in your browser. Your data never leaves your device.

name: Base64 Image
description: Convert images to Base64 and vice versa. Embed images in CSS or HTML.

details.title: Encode & Decode Modes
details.description: Instantly switch between encoding images to Base64 and decoding Base64 strings to images using the mode toggle. See results in real time as you interact.

details.title: Image & Base64 Input
details.description: Upload or paste an image to encode, or paste a Base64 string to decode. Input areas are clearly separated for each mode.

details.title: Output Preview
details.description: Instantly see the Base64 string or decoded image output. Preview images and copy results with one click.

details.title: One-Click Actions
details.description: Use Paste, Sample, Copy Input, Copy Output, and Clear buttons for fast workflow. No need to manually select or clear text.

details.title: Image Info
details.description: See image name, size, and type when encoding. Quickly verify your input before converting.

details.title: Real-Time Results
details.description: Output updates instantly as you interact. No page reloads or extra clicks required.

details.title: Minimal, Intuitive UI
details.description: Clean, distraction-free interface with clear separation between input and output. Designed for speed and clarity.

details.title: Offline & Private
details.description: All processing happens locally in your browser. Your data never leaves your device.

name: HTML Viewer
description: Preview and render HTML code. Test HTML snippets and templates.

details.title: Live HTML Preview
details.description: Instantly see your HTML rendered as you type. Edit and preview side-by-side for rapid development and debugging.

details.title: Offline & Private
details.description: All processing happens locally in your browser. Your data never leaves your device.

details.title: Lightning Fast & Secure
details.description: Built with Rust and React for instant startup and maximum performance. No internet required.

name: HTML Tools
description: Format, minify, and validate HTML code. Clean and optimize HTML markup.

details.title: Format HTML
details.description: Beautify your HTML for readability and clean code with a single click.

details.title: Minify HTML
details.description: Compress your HTML for faster load times and smaller file sizes.

details.title: Encode & Decode Entities
details.description: Easily encode or decode HTML entities for safe display or editing.

details.title: Validate HTML
details.description: Instantly validate your HTML and get clear error messages for invalid markup.

details.title: Preview HTML
details.description: See a live preview of your HTML output as you work.

details.title: Live Preview
details.description: Instantly see your Markdown rendered as you type, side-by-side with your code.

details.title: Syntax Highlighting
details.description: Enjoy code highlighting for a better writing and reading experience.

details.title: GitHub Flavored Markdown
details.description: Supports tables, task lists, strikethrough, and more. Just like on GitHub.

details.title: Export to HTML/PDF
details.description: Export your Markdown to clean HTML or PDF for sharing and publishing.

name: Compression Tools
description: Compress and decompress data using Brotli and Gzip algorithms. Convert between different compression formats and optimize file sizes.

details.description: Instantly compress or decompress text using GZIP or Brotli algorithms.

details.title: GZIP & Brotli Support
details.description: Choose between GZIP and Brotli for flexible compression options.

details.title: Size & Compression Stats
details.description: View original and compressed sizes, compression ratio, and bytes saved.

details.description: Quickly paste, sample, copy, or clear your text for a seamless workflow.

details.description: All processing happens locally in your browser. Your data never leaves your device.

name: JSON to Types
description: Convert JSON to strongly-typed models in various programming languages. Generate type-safe code from JSON schemas.

details.title: Convert JSON to Types
details.description: Instantly generate types from your JSON data for TypeScript, Rust, Python, Go, or Ruby.

details.title: Multiple Language Support
details.description: Switch between TypeScript, Rust, Python, Go, and Ruby output with a single click.

details.title: Customizable Settings
details.description: Fine-tune your generated types with settings for each language.

details.title: Sample, Clear, Copy
details.description: Quickly load sample JSON, clear your input, or copy your generated types for a seamless workflow.

details.description: All processing happens locally in your browser. Your data never leaves your device.

name: JWT Tools
description: Decode, verify, and debug JSON Web Tokens. JWK signature verification with automatic key fetching from identity providers.

details.title: Decode JWT
details.description: Instantly decode JWTs and inspect the header, payload, and signature.

details.title: Verify & Sign JWT
details.description: Verify JWT signatures and sign new tokens with your choice of algorithm.

details.description: Choose from HS256, RS256, ES256, and more for flexible JWT handling.

details.title: Sample, Copy, Clear
details.description: Quickly load sample JWTs, copy decoded data, or clear your input for a seamless workflow.

details.title: Password Strength & Analysis
details.description: Get instant feedback on password strength and a detailed analysis of your generated password.

details.description: Copy your password or clear the generator with a single click for a seamless workflow.

details.description: Instantly generate API keys, JWT secrets, webhook secrets, encryption keys, database passwords, OAuth secrets, WEP keys, Fort Knox passwords, CodeIgniter keys, and more.

details.description: See key length, algorithm, encryption type, and recommended usage tips for best practices.

details.description: Instantly generate hashes using a wide range of algorithms including MD5, SHA1, SHA256, SHA512, SHA3, RIPEMD, Whirlpool, CRC, BLAKE, Keccak, SM3, XXHash, Adler32, and more.

details.description: Copy any generated hash or clear your input with a single click for a seamless workflow.
